about_the_game:
[Game Plot]
Little Blue Hair works in a company that doesn’t respect its employees, and his boss always makes excessive demands.
Finally, one day, he decides to resign and leave this place.
But will everything go smoothly?

[Game Content]
“Escapism Ltd.” is a highly challenging 2D platform jumping game. Players can control the character, using skills like jumping, dashing, and climbing to find a way out in a work area full of traps.
In adventure mode, players can gradually explore and overcome challenges. At the same time, players can also collect envelopes to achieve various achievements.
In speedrun mode, players only need to rush to the finish line, helping the character escape at the fastest speed. The clearance time will enter the leaderboard for global PK.

[Game Features]
- Cute pixel art style
- Highly challenging level design
- The story of escaping a toxic work environment
